tool_description: Validates work order completion by checking quality standards, required documentation, and approval workflows.

work_order_id.description: Work order ID to validate for completion

validation_type.description: Type of validation: quality_check, safety_check, documentation_check, full_validation

materials_list_provided.description: Whether materials usage list is provided

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid validation type: Use one of [quality_check, safety_check, documentation_check, full_validation].
Work order not ready: Work order status is not 'completed' and cannot be validated.
Missing required documentation: Required documentation is missing for validation.
Validation already completed: This work order has already been successfully validated.
Inspector authorization required: validation_type requires a valid inspector_id.
usage: Provide work_order_id and validation_type. For comprehensive validation, include inspector_id and set appropriate boolean flags for documentation and approvals. Returns validation results and any required follow-up actions.

failed_criteria.description: List of validation criteria that failed

final_approval.description: Whether work order receives final approval
